name: Goblin Snowfight
description:
Goblin Snowfight

Info

Made for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021. Made in Unity. Gobbo is tired of being made fun of by Elfie and wants to settle it in a snowball fight. Get through the horde of Christmas wildlife to face Elfie.

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Fire: Arrow Keys

Rotate Camera: Q, E

Jump: Space

Pause: Escape

Confirm: Enter

PS4 controller support tested, but may have bugs.

Credits

Designer, Programmer, Modeler - CoalVoltage

Textures - ambientcg.com

Shaders - https://github.com/dsoft20/psx_retroshader

Music - Blissful Trance - Eric Matyas (soundimage.org)

Bugs Known

Menu does not show first selection.

Present Mimic can get stuck on edges.

Random sound plays when entering sub-level.
